protocol.text: Plant RNA prep using RNeasy (Qiagen) using the manufacturers protocols with RLT buffer

text: Affymetrix GeneChip® IVT Labelling Kit, according to manufactuer's protocol (GeneChip® Expression Analysis Technical Manual) processed at the Veteran's Medical Research Foundation core microarray facility (
Affymetrix Eukaryotic Target Hybridization protocol (GeneChip® Expression Analysis Technical Manual) processed at the Veteran's Medical Research Foundation core microarray facility (

Affymetrix® GeneChip® Scanner 3000 with GCOS software according to manufactuer's protocol (GeneChip® Expression Analysis Technical Manual) processed at the Veteran's Medical Research Foundation core microarray facility (

protocol.text: Probe set summarization and normalization was performed by robust multi-array averaging (RMA, including background subtraction, summarization by median polish and quantile normalization) using the R/Bioconductor package affy.
